message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet in the middle.
